name: GUNSLNGR5000
description:
🔫 🔫 🔫 LUDUM DARE 41 🔫 🔫 🔫

In a world where time has marched on, the deserts of the West are taken over by evil cyborgs, spreading anarchy and drinking all the booze. There is only one wise, gunslinging cowboy left alive, armed and ready to save the world. Can he scale the cyborg tower, one level at a time, starting with a robot bear from hell, to win back the West?

How to Play

  • A + D / Left & Right arrows: Walk
  • W / Up arrow: Climb
  • Spacebar: Jump 
  • Click on a card to use its skill, up to that card's play amount 
  • Collect cards by defeating enemies and reaching item boxes 
  • Cards protect the gunslinger from damage but are discarded on impact 

The Game Jam

  • Completed in under 72 hours, with original graphics and sound
  • Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres ² (Card game meets arcade platformer x Western meets Sci-fi)
  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Music & Sound Effects: Garage band and Audacity
  • Graphics: Photoshop and Sketch

The Team

  • Sean Lange
  • Wes Rulvacaba
  • Marissa Epstein
  • Jerad Bitner
